metadata.name: Earmarking Category
Catégorie de préaffectation
metadata.description: This codelist has been created by IATI and is derived from the Grand Bargain Earmarking Modality codelist.
Cette liste de code a été créée par l'IITA d'après la liste de code des modalités de préaffectation du "Grand Bargain".

codelist-item.name: Unearmarked
codelist-item.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes A,B or C.

codelist-item.name: Softly Earmarked
codelist-item.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes D,E or F.

codelist-item.name: Earmarked
codelist-item.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes G or H.

codelist-item.name: Tightly Earmarked
codelist-item.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes I,J or K.
